name: Wizard vs Orc Zombies 2
description:
Left-click: MISSILE (pierces through enemies in a line)
Right-click: FIREBALL (explodes, affecting a large area)

"You are Wizard, the only hero powerful
enough to stop the relentless Orc Zombies
from ravaging the kingdom! Use your spells
to keep them away from the castle."


That above is the story of the game, in its entirety. Maybe someday I'll come up with something better and more complex, but for now I'll stick with it.  :)

A few months after wrapping up Wizard vs Orc Zombies I decided to completely remake it from scratch with better graphics, and this is the result. I decided to call it a sequel, although it's technically a remake.

Wizard vs Orc Zombies 2 is very much incomplete and I'm still adding features to it, even if infrequently. Note that while the 'Mute' button might already be there, the game does not have any sounds yet, which means your audio equipment is fine.
